page.title: 05Young Farmers'Club,Longtown.
page.content: {Longtown}Young Farmers' Club celebrates its 40th Anniversary this year.It has a membership of over seventy.Fortnightly meetings cover a wide range of interests.Members participate in most competitions organised in the County Federation,recently winning the Junior Public Speaking Competition Cup,for the fourth successive year.Brainstrust ,debating,quizes,drama ,dressmaking & modelling competitions are popular ,completing the winter programme. Spring brings,stock judging & industrial competitions,with keen involvement,culminating in the County Rally in May.This calls for a high standard of widely varied talents .Tremendous interest is shown in the June Show and sale of calves reared by members.1985 exchange weekend was held with a Derbyshire Club.
